BRAND NEW STORY: THE LAST GOODBYE! From acclaimed Episode author Joseph Evans -- While you're falling in love, he's falling apart. Can you save him from himself before it's too late?

Also, ALL NEW EPISODES AVAILABLE NOW! Check out Tangled Love and Fake Love, True Love:

FAKE LOVE, TRUE LOVE: Your life takes a dramatic turn when you make a deal with a bad boy celeb. Things get even more complicated after you fall for a mysterious, sexy stranger. Who will truly steal your heart?

TANGLED LOVE: For Bella, moving in with her crush is a dream come true. Too bad, he acts like she doesn’t exist…Can you change that? From beloved Episode author, Noella Mei!

BRAND NEW STORY!! PITCH PERFECT IN DEEP TREBLE™!!

WHAT’S UP, PITCHES? THE BELLAS ARE BACK and they’re getting into deep treble. Sing in the spotlight and live out your dream of becoming a BELLA!

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests? Join Beca, Fat Amy and other Barden Bellas in Pitch Perfect In Deep Treble as you dance and sing your way to acapella fame. Trust us…it’s going to be ACA-MAZING!

Think you have what it takes to join the Bellas? Check out this brand new story in the Episode app today!

HAPPY HOLIDAYS FROM EPISODE!

CAMERON DALLAS IS THE NEWEST ADDITION TO THE EPISODE FAM!! All new story - Cameron Dallas: Started With a Lie!

Also, PART 2 OF FALLING FOR THE DOLAN TWINS, now in the app!

A romance of a lifetime starts to blossom between you and Cameron Dallas...but it all started with a lie. When you get stuck in the middle of a massive murder investigation, will you be able to keep track of all the lies and let Cameron into your heart?

It’s going down with the Dolan Twins!! Romance is in the air and your boyfriend has something MAJOR to tell you. Will you be able to handle your brand new frenemies forever at Hollywood High, your newfound Dolan dating status, all while planning an epic night to remember for Ethan and Grayson?! Plus, the twins have a super secret project underway—you might just fall for them all over again!

Think you have what it takes to handle all these boys?? Check out these brand new stories in the Episode app today!

In RECENTLY ROYAL -- you're in love with two hot princes, but you can only marry one. Fairy dust meets royalty in this fairytale...and your secret identity is just the beginning of the fun!

And THE MATCHMAKER! You’re the #1 matchmaker in NYC, your career's on fire, but your love life's on ice. What if the REAL Cupid comes to call?
